title: Blended Learning-Based Team Competency Enhancement Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic project management principles
context.additional_context: Course optimized for smartphone-based collaborative learning environments. Implementation of team competency development scenarios considering administrator/leader roles

learning_goals: Learners develop role-allocation strategies for achieving team objectives in blended environments
Learners conduct three or more real-time feedback meetings using smartphone-based collaboration tools
Learners can propose team performance improvement strategies based on competency assessment results conducted at least twice during the project period.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
